djf.ui

Class AppMessageDialogSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • djf.ui.AppMessageDialogSingleton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class AppMessageDialogSingleton
extends javafx.stage.Stage
    This class serves to present custom text messages to the user when events occur. Note that it always provides the same controls, a label with a message, and a single Ok button.

    • Property Summary

      • getSingleton

        public static AppMessageDialogSingleton getSingleton()
        A static accessor method for getting the singleton object.
        Returns:
        The one singleton dialog of this object type.

      • init

        public void init(javafx.stage.Stage owner)
        This function fully initializes the singleton dialog for use.
        Parameters:
        owner - The window above which this dialog will be centered.

      • show

        public void show(java.lang.String title,
                 java.lang.String message)
        This method loads a custom message into the label and then pops open the dialog.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to appear in the dialog window.
        message - Message to appear inside the dialog.
